source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenery shot. The video shows a walkthrough of a long, ornate hallway, likely within a museum or palace. The camera moves forward, capturing the elaborately painted vaulted ceiling and the detailed artwork on the walls.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a scenery shot. The video shows a walkthrough of a long, ornate hallway, likely within a museum or palace. The camera moves forward, capturing the elaborately painted vaulted ceiling and the detailed artwork on the walls.

generated_critique: The caption incorrectly classifies the video as a "scenery shot" and omits the motion of the people, who are salient subjects. The instructions require describing the motion of human subjects when they are present. The caption also includes the speculative phrase "likely within a museum or palace," which should be avoided. The description should be revised to describe the forward movement from the camera's point of view through the hall, while also noting the collective motion of the other people walking in both directions and standing still.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: From a first-person point of view, the camera moves forward through a long, ornate hallway with an elaborately painted, vaulted ceiling and artwork on the walls. Other people are also in the hallway; some walk in the same direction as the camera, some walk toward it, and others stand still, observing their surroundings.
